name: EazyTemplates – Gutenberg Template Library
author: EazyPlugins

sections.description:
ðŸ‘‰ Check out our website for more details about EazyTemplates : View Demo

Enhance the Gutenberg editor with our ever-growing library of WordPress templates. Discover new possibility and implement any design on your website in record time. Eazy Templates work with all themes and external plugins and makes your website creation a joy. Don’t waste hours trying to recreate a template you love. EazyTemplates can help you import custom templates and lets you focus on your content.

What does this Plugin do?

  • Browse 350+ handcrafted templates, layouts & sections from your Gutenberg Editor and add to your site immediately.

  • Preview each template before using it.

  • Filter through your templates to choose just the right template that suits your need.

  • See instantly which Gutenberg templates you have everything for, or may need to install some dependencies.

  • Automated install of anything you may need to install any template.

  • Append or Replace items in current page.

Features

Trending Design – EazyTemplates always get updates with recent trendy design. You won’t need a single line of code to use the layouts.

Create Effortless Website – Avoid hassle to creating a website with Gutenberg.

Device Optimization – Without device optimization, you can not shine in the website building industry. And, undoubtedly you will use device-enhanced template layouts.

Intelligent Installations – To manage the template, you may need to install different plugins. EazyTemplates is aware of painless installations with help of built-in intelligence.

Designed for Everything – Extend your design anywhere you need. The template layouts are not manufactured for specific types of websites.

Light Weight Website – Speedy and all theme supported WordPress website is all we need in this century. Welcome to EazyTemplates which keeps these promises right away.

All Theme Supported – EazyTemplates is powered by core Gutenberg Block Editor. Any Gutenberg supported theme will adjust with your site seamlessly.
sections.installation:
Using The WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Search for ‘EazyTemplates’
  3. Click ‘Install Now’
  4. Activate the plugin on the Plugin dashboard

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  3. Select eazytemplates.zip from your computer
  4. Click ‘Install Now’
  5. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download eazytemplates.zip
  2. Extract the eazytemplates directory to your computer
  3. Upload the eazytemplates directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard
sections.faq:
What is EazyTemplates?

The journey of EazyTemplates is started by a group of WordPress experienced people. This team is growing with the same goal of modernizing WordPress user experience. They are the creator of HappyAddons, EazyGrid, EazyFilter, Bucket Admin, Happy Monster and more.

Can I use EazyTemplates with any theme?

Yes, you can. Within a few minutes, you can build an outstanding website. EazyTemplates supports all the current updated themes. We recommend using a blocksy theme for the best fit.

Can I use EazyTemplates with WooCommerce?

Yes, EazyTemplates is compatible with WooCommerce. Just install and manage WooCommerce separately to set up eCommerce system.

Is there a free version?

Yes, EazyTemplates is a free plugin available through the WordPress.org directory that allows all users to extend the power of the Gutenberg Block Editor. Enjoy and utilize this website builder as much as possible.

Do I need to be a developer to use EazyTemplates?

Not at all! EazyTemplates is build to empower all sorts of users to make their dreams come true with ZERO coding skills.

Can I use EazyTemplates with page builders?

EazyTemplates is powered by Gutenberg. Specially, the templates and patterns/sections are designed for the Gutenberg Block Editor. Even if you’ve used a page builder to create other pages on your site, still you can use EazyTemplates to manufacture new pages.

Will EazyTemplates slow down my website?

Never ever! The templates in EazyTemplates are extremely lightweight that will serve directly from your WordPress website. Our templates use the core Gutenberg Editor as not to add any additional bloat.
sections.changelog:
1.2.0

  • Introduced template kits
  • Added 25 new page templates
  • Added 40 new section templates
  • Added 5 new template kits

1.1.2

  • Added 4 new page templates
  • Added 73 new section templates

1.1.1

  • Added 2 new page templates
  • Added 7 new section templates
  • Introduced template search
  • Introduced template sorting
  • Fixed minor bugs

1.1.0

  • Introduced sections
  • Added 150 new section templates
  • Added 15 new page templates
  • Introduced option to append template to existing content
  • Introduced ability to filter templates by color

1.0.1

  • Minor updates

1.0.0

  • Initial Release
